subject: Re: [junit] Re: Junit 3 suite setup tear down
msgSnippet: I think perhaps another thread or tracker item is the best place to continue this conversation; I m confused about what set of requirements we re designing
messageBody:
I think perhaps another thread or tracker item is the best place to
continue this conversation; I'm confused about what set of
requirements we're designing toward.

David Saff

> --- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "David Saff" <david@...> wrote:

>> >> On Mon, Aug 11, 2008 at 3:05 PM, toalexsmail <toalexsmail@> wrote:

>> >> >> @RunWith(Suite.class)
>> >> >> @SuiteClasses(A.class, B.class)

>> >> >> @AfterClass public static void doYourOneTimeTeardown() {}
>> >> >> }

>> >> > Second of all, it is quite verbose and not very flexible.
>> >>
>> >> toalexsmail,
>> >>

>> >> David Saff

>>
>> David
